question: Which of the following arrangement of the languages in decreasing order of their speakers in India is correct?
option1: Urdu, Tamil, Marathi, Telugu, Bengali, Hindi
option2: Hindi, Marathi, Bengali, Urdu, Telugu, Tamil
option3: Hindi, Tamil Telugu, Marathi, Bengali, Urdu
option4: Hindi, Bengali, Telugu, Marathi, Tamil, Urdu
answer: Hindi, Bengali, Telugu, Marathi, Tamil, Urdu
explanation: Speakers of languages Hindi (53.60%), Bengali (8.86%), Telugu (8.26%), Marathi (8.16%), Tamil (6.49%), Urdu (5.74%).
